Package ltl2rabin

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Automaton<T,U>
    This is the abstract base class for all automata.
    Automaton.State<R,S>
    The abstract base class for all states.
    Automaton.Transition<S extends Automaton.State,L>
    A Transition represents a function (State → Letter → State).
    AutomatonFactory<F,A,L>
    The abstract base class for all factories that build Automaton objects.
    GDRA
    A GDRA object represents a generalized deterministic Rabin automaton.
    GDRA.State  
    GDRA.Transition  
    GDRAFactory
    A GDRAFactory can create a GDRA out of the LTLFactory.Result of an LTLFactory.
    HanoiFormatStringFactory
    This class provides static functions that convert Automata to Strings in the Hanoi Omega Automaton Format (hoaf).
    Main
    This is the main class, the entry point for the application.
    MojmirAutomaton<T,L>
    This class describes a Mojmir automaton.
    MojmirAutomaton.State<R,S>
    A MojmirAutomaton.State additionaly to a Automaton.State has a flag indicating if it is a sink or not.
    MojmirAutomatonFactory<F>
    This class is the base class for Factories that create MojmirAutomaton objects.
    MojmirAutomatonFactoryFromFormula
    A MojmirAutomatonFactoryFromFormula provides a MojmirAutomatonFactoryFromFormula.createFrom(Formula) method that takes a Formula and returns a MojmirAutomaton.
    MojmirAutomatonFactoryFromString
    A MojmirAutomatonFactoryFromString provides a MojmirAutomatonFactoryFromString.createFrom(String) method that takes a String and returns a MojmirAutomaton.
    Pair<F,S>
    A 2-tuple.
    RabinAutomaton<T,U extends Collection>  
    RabinAutomaton.State<R,S>  
    RabinAutomatonFactory<F,A,L>  
    SubAutomaton
    SubAutomata are Rabin automata that are constructed for a G-subformula.
    SubAutomaton.State
    A SubAutomaton.State is labelled with a List of MojmirAutomaton.States.
    SubAutomaton.Transition  
    SubAutomatonFromFormulaFactory
    A SubAutomatonFromFormulaFactory can create a SubAutomaton from an Formula object, using its alphabet.
    SubAutomatonFromMojmirFactory
    A factory of this type will create a SubAutomaton (which is a state ranking for a Mojmir automatons) out of a given MojmirAutomaton.
